conflictScenarios.name: Academic Burnout
conflictScenarios.description: Character is feeling overwhelmed by their studies and losing motivation.

resolutionOptions.name: Encourage Rest and Balance
resolutionOptions.description: Suggest taking a break and finding better work-life balance

outcomes.storyImpact: Character learns healthy study habits and feels more balanced

resolutionOptions.name: Help Create Study Plan
resolutionOptions.description: Work together to create a more manageable study schedule

outcomes.storyImpact: Character develops better organizational skills and feels more confident

conflictScenarios.name: Creative Block
conflictScenarios.description: Character is struggling with a creative block and feels uninspired.

resolutionOptions.name: Explore New Inspirations
resolutionOptions.description: Encourage character to try new experiences for inspiration

outcomes.storyImpact: Character discovers new sources of inspiration and renewed enthusiasm

resolutionOptions.name: Practice Different Techniques
resolutionOptions.description: Suggest trying new artistic techniques or mediums

outcomes.storyImpact: Character expands their artistic skills and breaks through their block

conflictScenarios.name: Friendship Disagreement
conflictScenarios.description: Character has had a disagreement with a close friend and isn't sure how to resolve it.

resolutionOptions.name: Encourage Direct Communication
resolutionOptions.description: Suggest talking openly and honestly with their friend

outcomes.storyImpact: Character learns valuable communication skills and strengthens their friendship

resolutionOptions.name: Help Find Common Ground
resolutionOptions.description: Work together to identify shared interests and values

outcomes.storyImpact: Character develops better conflict resolution skills and deeper friendships

conflictScenarios.name: Self-Doubt Challenge
conflictScenarios.description: Character is struggling with self-confidence and doubting their abilities.

resolutionOptions.name: Celebrate Small Victories
resolutionOptions.description: Help character recognize and celebrate their achievements

outcomes.storyImpact: Character builds self-confidence through positive reinforcement

resolutionOptions.name: Set Achievable Goals
resolutionOptions.description: Work together to set realistic, achievable goals

outcomes.storyImpact: Character develops better goal-setting skills and self-confidence
